skills.skill: Cisco FirePower, Cisco Nexus & Load balancing technology
InfoBlox DNS, DHCP, and IPAM system
ITIL, DevOps, ITSM, Kanban, Agile methodologies, Scrum development

duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot network problems, including IP address auditing.
Design networking environment and direct system installation.
Define, document, and enforce system standards.
Troubleshoot network problems and schedule upgrades.
Collaborate with network architects on network optimization.
Secure network systems by establishing and enforcing policies.
Participate in educational opportunities and professional organizations.
Accomplish information systems and organization mission.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant field desired. Minimum of 8 to 10 years of experience in engineering and supporting networks in a multi-vendor, multi-cloud, organization. Cisco CCNA, CCNP - Optional.
